name: Ride Concepts Vice Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Combine freeride performance with urban style. Ride Concepts worked with the experts at Rubber Kinetics to create a proprietary outsole compound that provides excellent grip on flat pedals without sacrificing durability.Suede upper is durable and protective.Perforated for enhanced breathability.Fully gusseted tongue keeps debris out.TPU toe protection protects your feet from big hits.D3O insole adds additional protection in high impact zones underfoot.EVA midsole provides support and shock absorption.DST 6 High Grip rubber outsole sticks to your pedals.Hexagonal tread pattern enhances grip on flat pedals.
